line_1: If while the Mind was in her Leg,
Pray answer only with Your Leg.
line_2: And while My Principles I beg;

line_1: "And while that hand is thine and thine a leg,
line_2: " Scorn of the proud or of the base to beg. "

line_1: FOP! you can dance, and make a Leg,
line_2: Can fetch and carry, cringe and beg,

line_1: T' other shocking — and so have a hose to each leg:
line_2: And for fear you shou'd think me too bold, I'd fain beg

line_1: Should my soldier return wi' a poor wooden leg!
line_2: Yet I'd live upon Chelsea, or even wad beg,

line_1: Should my soldier return wi' a poor wooden leg!
line_2: Yet I'd live upon Chelsea, or even wad beg,

line_1: I'll laugh, an' sing, an' shake my leg,
line_2: She's gien me monie a jirt an' fleg,

line_1: I'll laugh, an' sing, an' shake my leg,
line_2: Sin I could striddle owre a rig;

line_1: I'll laugh, an' sing, an' shake my leg,
line_2: But by the L — d, tho' I should beg
Prepar'd at once to rob or beg.

line_1: All the Members to Hear when I set out my Leg.
line_2: I have no Kind of Doubt but the Speaker will beg

line_1: " He swears, and shews it in his wooden leg.
line_2: " The mangled private may go hang or beg,
